alert.note: Alert for Ascension; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 15 at 5:28AM CDT until March 15 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST...SOUTHEASTERN ASCENSION...NORTHERN ST. JAMES...SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL TANGIPAHOA PARISHES... At 528 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sorrento, or 9 miles east of Gonzales, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, French Settlement, Whitehall and Garyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 183 and 204. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 3 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; St. James; St. John The Baptist
